column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Turns out they aren't really the same thing.  Lou Malnati's deep dish has a thick
column2: bready crust and a tangy tomato sauce.  In comparison
column3: Zachary's has less of a bready crust
column4: with toppings stuffed into the crust
column5: and a pile of stewed tomatoes on top.  So yeah
column6: they are really different and hard to directly compare.
